name: Nukes of Bastion
description:
Classical turn-based roguelike* styled game, with pixel art graphics. It's a post-apocalyptic era where you need to scavenge supplies and weapons to survive.

*From Wikipedia:
"Roguelike is a subgenre of role-playing video games that are characterized by random level generation, turn-based gameplay, tile-based graphics, and permanent death of the player-character."

Also features:
- 11 Races and 9 Linages to choose from to creature and customize your character.
- Big procedural generated dungeons
- Level up system, difficulty increased as you progress your character.
- Unique weapon range system scaled with your character's attributes
- Many interesting items
- Each weapon has it's own unique ability
- Comfortable controls
- Constantly updating
- Random scavenger encounters
Fun and intense combat. You can choose several ways to attack your enemies. Use your powers or the brute force! Teach them not to mess with you!
- A great world map to explore. The wasteland is such a dangerous place. Every map will give you nightmares, they are unique and full of surprises.
- Replay Value. Every run will be different depending of the decisions that you choose.

The game is still in development in and I am actively working on new content and gameplay elements, if you find a bug please report it to me.

"I don't think that I have known something such as the end of the war. Those who have known it are the dead who no longer exist in this life after the catastrophe." 

###Welcome to Nukes of Bastion###
A 2D Roguelike game situated in a post-apocalyptic era. Feel the torment of the wasteland trying to resolve his mysteries. You can choose to help people or be the new monster in the land. This is a game that is made from decisions. Choose your own path in a big world.
